About This Website

This website was created by one of the La Meche business team members to provide our customers with a better digital experience and to offer them exclusive discounts on our luxury candle collection.

Our goal was to bridge the gap between our physical products and digital presence, ensuring that every customer can easily access information about our candles, place pre-orders, and enjoy special promotional offers through this interactive platform.

About La Mèche

Market Research & Business Approach

La Meche is more than just wax in a jar; it's all about mood, identity, and connection. Our main business aim is to produce and sell a product that reflects current trends in youth lifestyle while also staying affordable for our target market, which includes students and young adults aged 15-25.

Each role in our team was structured around real business departments from marketing, finance to design operations, ensuring we covered all the necessary areas of business functions. Through this structure, our team is able to operate effectively. For example, our CFOs manage budgeting and break-even analysis, while our marketing team uses the containers insights to build strong branding.

What makes our business stand out is how we've taken consumer feedback seriously. From analysing survey data around design preference, scent choice, and packaging importance, we've developed a strong understanding of what our audience wants. Our business operates on market orientation, meaning we shape our product based on the needs and preferences of the customer.

This was shown clearly through our decision to move forward with Tropical and Vanilla candles after reviewing our survey results.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our luxury candles

What makes La Mèche candles different from others? ▼

Our candles are crafted with 100% natural soy wax, premium cotton wicks, and carefully curated fragrances. Each candle is hand-poured by skilled artisans and designed to provide over 50 hours of clean, even burning. We also prioritize sustainability in our packaging and sourcing.

How long do your candles burn? ▼

Our standard-sized candles provide approximately 50-60 hours of burn time when used properly. To maximize burn time, always trim the wick to 1/4 inch before lighting and avoid burning for more than 4 hours at a time.

Are your candles eco-friendly? ▼

Absolutely! We use 100% natural soy wax, which burns cleaner than paraffin. Our wicks are made from cotton, our packaging is recyclable, and we source our materials from sustainable suppliers. We're committed to creating luxury products that don't harm the environment.

How can I get my candles? ▼

We offer in-person pickup at select locations. Pickup dates and locations will be announced to pre-order customers first. This allows us to maintain quality control and provide a personal touch to your candle experience.

Can I customize scents or create custom orders? ▼

Currently, we offer our carefully curated collection of four signature scents. However, we're exploring custom scent options for the future. Sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know about new offerings and custom order opportunities.

Do you offer refunds or exchanges? ▼

We stand behind the quality of our products. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. For damaged items, we'll provide immediate replacement or full refund.

How should I care for my candle? ▼

For optimal performance: trim wick to 1/4 inch before each use, burn for no more than 4 hours at a time, keep away from drafts, and ensure the wax pool reaches the edges on first burn. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

Are your candles safe around pets? ▼

Our soy wax candles are generally safer than paraffin candles around pets since they don't release harmful chemicals. However, always keep candles out of reach of pets, ensure proper ventilation, and never leave burning candles unattended around animals.
